Inhaled Salbutamol Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Inhaled Salbutamol Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Inhaled Salbutamol Population In Need.description: The proportion of persons who require the intervention

Inhaled Salbutamol Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
